attributes.action: We ask for privileges for Turkish students (Uni,MA-MSc,PhD) studying in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: We have no doubt that the competent authorities will handle this issue with sensitivity.
attributes.background: We ask for privileges for Turkish students (University,MA-MSc,PhD) studying in the UK.Just get students from the Red List to the Amber list. All of the students who are currently on hold have had their double dose of Covid19 vaccines (Pfizer-BioNTech)

rejection.details:
The Government does not make dispensations for particular groups of people from particular countries, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remove Turkey from the red list: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587179

Change requirements for managed quarantine for international students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589699
